programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club
programme.desc: Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club
programme.desc: Today at Squirrel Club, there are all sorts of comparisons to learn - from small to smallest, hungry to hungriest, and Duggee to Duggiest!

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: After hearing about how the Monument to the Equator in Ciudad Mitad del Mundo is in the wrong location, Glitch and his Glitchbots pretend to be the Go Jetters and move the monument onto the equator.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey, Bingo and Mum get into a debate with Dad about the definition of teasing. As they recall all the times where he's been a Big Teaser, Dad argues that he was only just playing.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey needs her Mum's advice on dealing with a troublesome neighbour, when the serenity of her couch cushion playhouse is threatened by Bingo's own growing stable of animals.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions
programme.desc: In this episode, Andy, Jen and Scout head to Alaska, America on a baby animal mission to help rescue some black bear cubs high up in a tree. Along the way, Andy meets a grumpy Arctic ground squirrel.

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Search and rescue dog Dan and his owner Jamie set off on an urban search, looking for Pop-Pop who has got lost while exploring near his care home.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild
programme.desc: Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet two amazing animals: this time it's the tamarin and crowned pigeon. Their wild connection is that they both have fancy 'hairdos'.

programme.title: Swashbuckle
programme.desc: The pirates find a locker washed up on the shore belonging to the legendary pirate Davy Jones. But can they find a way to get to his legendary treasure inside?

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee's made some delicious pancakes, but the clubhouse is out of honey. Time for the bees to get busy!

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee has made a beautiful rock pool. The Squirrels spot the strangest things - dots with tails, wriggling around. What on earth are they? They are baby frogs - tadpoles!

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: It's a very windy day and the squirrels want to play outside. What can they do? Duggee knows - he's flying his kite. The Squirrels set about making their own kites to fly.

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: The Go Jetters visit a nature reserve in China. But who's taking all the pandas' bamboo?

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: Kyan and Foz are working on their compass navigation skills and need to find the North Tower within a magnificent maze in order to pass their academy test.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: When Rebecca works with the Troublesome Trucks, everyone expects the worst, but she defies everyone's expectations and has a very amusing day.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck
programme.desc: The Librarian has lost his big reference book and Sarah thinks her toy periscope might help with the search.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck
programme.desc: Scooter Boy gets his confidence knocked after a small accident, so Sarah and Duck help him to get it back.

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Myrtle wants everyone to see her new dance so enlists Stanley to gather some friends. However, the stereo breaks so they have to make their own music.

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Stanley must teach his friends how to knit. They all knit so much they burst out the top of the community centre. Stanley repairs the roof with the groups knitting.

programme.title: Kazoops!
programme.desc: Monty wonders whether it is okay to give away surprises when his mother starts to plan a special treat for Stan.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran
programme.desc: JoJo has lots of questions about the bin lorries that keep Gran Gran's street tidy. And it's time for JoJo to keep the community garden tidy on a litter pick with the Nature Club.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo hide under the house and spy on two mysterious tradies working in the backyard, wondering what they're up to.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Muffin is playing Grouchy Granny at a garage sale, making Dad push her on an old mobility scooter, but when a real Grouchy Granny wants to buy it, Muffin won't budge.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Mackenzie, Jack and Rusty are playing as astronauts on a mission to Mars, but during their journey, Mackenzie keeps going missing and no one knows why, not even Mackenzie.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: When a dancing bug lands on Duggee's head, he can't stop dancing. The Squirrels see that it's a tiny hillbilly bug with a fiddle. And what's more, he's got a band with him - the Hillbilly Bug Band.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: A box full of bits and pieces is delivered to the Clubhouse and the Squirrels are excited. Duggee and the Squirrels are going to have to work hard to put it all together. Time for a bit of teamwork.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club
programme.desc: It's fun on the counting train until Naughty Monkey starts to drive! Ethel makes a shape, Frog drops beats with a ribbit song, and Enid turns into anime to chase after a mouse.

programme.title: Pok Ya Cong Codei Siti Di Hati
programme.desc: Pok Ya cannot forget Siti, his wife, who has run away. To heal this hurt, Pok Ya marries his friend's daughter, but his new wife is not as docile as Siti.

programme.title: Satu Kampung Dua Orang
programme.desc: Selepas banjir besar melanda, semua penduduk kampung berpindah kerana kampung mereka tidak lagi selamat. Hanya dua beradik yang enggan berpindah atas sebab dan alasan mereka tersendiri.

programme.title: Jamil Balik Kampung
programme.desc: Kisah perjalanan Jamil pulang ke kampung untuk meminang kekasihnya setelah pinangannya pernah ditolak beberapa kali. Berjayakah misi Jamil kali ini?

programme.title: Well be back at 6.00am
programme.desc: Well be back at 6.00am

programme.title: Sampai Nanti
programme.desc: Kyle dan Milly bertemu kembali setelah 10 tahun terpisah dan cinta lama kembali terjalin. Tetapi adakah cinta mereka akan terus kekal hingga ke akhirnya?

programme.title: Asam Pedas Cendol Sejoli
programme.desc: Karim adalah pemilik kedai cendol bersebelahan dengan kedai asam pedas Kalsom. Mereka bermusuhan, tetapi anak mereka Kinah dan Khalil mencintai satu sama lain, dan terpaksa menyembunyikan perkara

programme.title: Tolong Saya Encik Dinosaur
programme.desc: Elly berpindah dari bandar ke pekan kecil untuk mencari ketenangan. Tetapi kenangan buruk tetap menghantui dirinya, sehinggalah dia bertemu dengan Karl yang mengajarnya erti sebuah kebahagiaan.

programme.title: Cubit - Cubit Cinta
programme.desc: Kupid Cubit is a dating app that enables the masses to find love. But for Katarina and Saiful, it's a platform for healing people with unrequited love.

programme.title: Duit Kawin
programme.desc: Memaparkan pemikiran remaja sekarang terhadap perkahwinan dari sudut kos atas syariat agama tetapi tertekan cara hidup zaman kini yang mahukan kemewahan.

programme.title: Biarkan Cinta Tersenyum Lagi
programme.desc: Kisah penulis lagu Maya Arisa yang menghidap tumor otak dan mengimpikan untuk berkahwin. Dia kemudiannya bertemu dengan seorang jurugambar bernama Redza.

programme.title: Ayat Dari Langit
programme.desc: Ustaz Muiz dan isterinya mengajar ajaran sesat dan mahu pengikutnya mengikut telunjuk mereka yang lama kelamaan mula membuatkan pengikutnya bernama Kamal mula merasa sangsi.

programme.title: Cinta Round 1
programme.desc: Farid is a nerdy guy who always been bullied by Syakirin, his senior. Farid determined to enter an MMA tournament organized by their university so to put an end to being bullied by Syakirin.

programme.title: Racun Suami Jahanam
programme.desc: Suraya is a naive village girl who looks forward to happy days when Hazrul proposes to her. But those happy days are only temporary when she learns who Hazrul really is.

programme.title: 6 Hari
programme.desc: Suzi is content with being a third wife and living alone in her bungalow as she only entertains her husband every 6 days. Everything comes crashing when a person from her past returns to her life.

programme.title: Please Subscribe Cintaku
programme.desc: Hannah and her friend Alia have gone to an abandoned construction site to find material for her YouTube channel, but she unknowingly records a murder.
